title: Salesforce Projects Weak Sales Growth, Fueling AI Anxiety
description: Salesforce Inc. projected lackluster quarterly sales growth, suggesting its artificial intelligence product isn’t yet paying off as quickly as hoped in the face of competition from emerging AI companies.

title: Trump Says Musk Has ‘Problems’ But Sees Him Returning to GOP
description: President Donald Trump said former ally Elon Musk has no choice but to return to the Republican Party after their highly public rift earlier this year.

title: NBC Says NFL Ad Inventory 90% Sold Out, Super Bowl Is Booked
description: NBCUniversal’s ad inventory for the upcoming NFL season is 90% sold out, with the 2026 Super Bowl already fully booked.
